item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: IMGN (ImmunoGen, Inc.) Small ImmunoGen shows strong potential for growth in the biotech sector with positive industry outlook and earnings prospects, despite inherent market risks and volatility. PDD (PDD Holdings Inc.) Large Despite potential risks, the Chinese e-commerce market offers opportunities for growth and innovation, and PDD Holdings is well-positioned to take advantage of these opportunities.
